articles.title: Its looking like one trade, a $5.4mn one, triggered 'Deutsche Bank' global rout on Friday - ForexLive
articles.description: Bloomberg carry the report (Bloomberg is gated) that 'Regulators are singling out a trade on Deutsche Bank AG’s credit default swaps that they suspect fueled a global sell off on Friday.
